name: CROWN COMMUNICATIONS, Petitioner, v. ZONING HEARING BOARD OF THE BOROUGH OF GLENFIELD and John A. Straka, Respondent
name_abbreviation: Crown Communications v. Zoning Hearing Board

parties: CROWN COMMUNICATIONS, Petitioner, v. ZONING HEARING BOARD OF THE BOROUGH OF GLENFIELD and John A. Straka, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
AND NOW, this 16th day of April, 1997, we GRANT this Petition for Allowance of Appeal, limited to the issue of what test should be applied to determine whether a business entity is a public utility for zoning purposes where the zoning ordinance does not define the term public utility.

attorneys: William R. Sittig, Pittsburgh, for Petitioner.
casebody.head_matter:
691 A.2d 458
CROWN COMMUNICATIONS, Petitioner, v. ZONING HEARING BOARD OF THE BOROUGH OF GLENFIELD and John A. Straka, Respondent.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
April 16, 1997.
William R. Sittig, Pittsburgh, for Petitioner.
